description:
Welcome to SAP Fiori Essentials. This course is for beginners looking to improve their SAP Fiori skills and stand from the crowd. Land your dream job or qualify for a promotion.

SAP is a multinational software corporation that makes enterprise software to manage business operations. More than 80% of fortune 500 companies have successfully implemented SAP products. SAP was named the most valuable brand in Europe with a value of over 33 billion euros in 2015.

Reviews:

"First course I have taken. A good hint is to take notes as you go along and review everyday to keep pace."

"Really great course. Enjoyable to take, Simon did a great job of explaining the concepts and then giving demos, quizzes and practice. The course really brought together various threads around Fiori for me."

Fiori is a beautiful Italian flower, that implies the ambitions of SAP on user experiences. Since it is a quite new, the needs for Fiori consultants are really high, which I bet this course is an excellent option to boost your career.

SAP consultants are in high demand and earn $120,000 a year on average.

Explore SAP Product Portfolio is a beginners course that will guide you through the techniques and knowledge used by SAP consultants worldwide.

The course is taught through a mix of video and workbooks:

  • Fiori Overview
  • Architecture
  • Installing Fiori
  • Configuring Fiori
  • Fiori Launchpad
  • Fiori Client
  • Developing Fiori Apps

We've fully updated the course for 2015 and now include:

  • 2 hours of HD video training including lectures and quizzes
  • 7 additional readings and supplemental material for SAP niches
  • 10+ 5 star reviews in just a week
  • 30 day money back guaranteed

The course will help you think like an entrepreneur and expand your business knowledge and technical proficiency.

We'll be with you every step of your SAP career with lifetime support.

What's holding you back from reaching your job potential? Enroll today and put your SAP career on a fast track.
title: SAP Fiori - Build Your SAP Fiori Foundation
